nodes.text: Kafane was a poor agricultural planet that was located within the Kafane system of the galaxy's Hutt Space region. Kafane was connected to the worlds of Nimia and Ulmatra by the hyperlane called The Dead Road.
Kafane was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and published on August 18, 2009, which placed the planet in grid square S-9.
